General.Name: Southern Gold Ltd
General.Description: Southern Gold Limited engages in the exploration and production of gold deposits in South Korea. The company also explores for silver and other mineral deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Deokon gold-silver project located in South Korea. Southern Gold Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Norwood, Australia.

1.Name: Mr. Raymond Robert Ridge B.A., BA (Acc), C.A., CA, GIA (cert)
1.Title: Financial Controller, CFO & Company Sec.

0.name: U.S. Global Investors Fund-World Precious Minerals Fund
